# Example Razor 1911 intro by Nerve

#### Written in 2012 October.


[WinASM IDE recommendation](https://www.winasm.org/).

Note `razor_intro.exe` is not included as it [flags some false positive alerts](https://www.virustotal.com/gui/file/5dd8a17d5a7bed02ff037e70905178eeab7479a2c928555d80f81e3e8f6e5484).

[Original archive](https://defacto2.net/f/b03821).

---

         :: presents : Razor 1911 Intro : Example    ::     \

 .:::::. '::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::'
 ::  iNFORMATION   :::
 ::...............:::'
 ::
 ::  This is an example cracktro with the MASM32 source code.
 ::  open the razor.wap file with WinASM IDE (g00gle!)
 ::
 ::  The logo was taken from an old Razor 1911 cracktro, evidently
 ::  by someone named Poise.
 ::
 ::  Music is Botkyrka Sidekickers by Dubmood :)
 ::
 ::  Have fun with the source code :)
 ::
 ::  *** NOTE ***
 ::  razor_intro.exe <-- cracktro version WITH random screen noise
 ::                      ( this may run slow on some old machines, i.e p4 )  .
 ::  razor_nonoise.exe <-- cracktro version WITHOUT noise
 ::                                                                         .
 ::                                                                          .'
 ::  anyway.... enjoy :)                                                    ' .
 ::                                                                         .::
 :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::'
